simpledc.title: Interview with D. H. Mellor (2001)
simpledc.creator: Mellor, David Hugh
Maurin, Anna-Sofia
Persson, Johannes
simpledc.subject: Mellor
Metaphysics
simpledc.description: This article is the text of an interview with D. H. Mellor conducted in Cambridge on 30 May 2001 by Anna-Sofia Maurin and Johannes Persson for the philosophical journal Theoria.
